protocol.name: P-GSE20256-1
text: ABS_CALL = the call in an absolute analysis that indicates if the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M)
DETECTION P-VALUE = p-value that indicates the significance level of the detection call

protocol.name: P-GSE20256-2
protocol.text: Seeds were sterilized in 70% ethanol 0.0125% Triton then washed in 90% ethanol. Seeds were plated on 9 cm 0.5g/l ms plates for 10 days for col, swn-7, and clf-28, and 12 days for the swn-7 clf-28 double mutant

protocol.name: P-GSE20256-4
protocol.text: Labelled using protocol described in manual "Affymetrix GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual", One-Cycle target labelling

protocol.name: P-GSE20256-5
protocol.text: Biotin Labelled cRNA using "Affymetrix GeneChip Hybridization, Wash and Stain Kit", according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA

protocol.name: P-GSE20256-6
protocol.text: Scanned according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA.

protocol.name: P-GSE20256-7
protocol.text: Raw data from the microarrays was normalized at probe-level using MAS5 algorithm. The detection calls (present, marginal, absent) for each probe set was obtained using the GCOS system
